subject: Dear Customer,
body:
Dear Customer,
Thank you for your patronage and for using Western Union Money Transfer to send money, we are so happy to have a Customer like you and For using Western Union, your details were put to the Ballot box for the ongoing 2023 Western Union Money Transfer End of the Year Bonanza Draw, otherwise Promo.
You have won yourself the sum of $US100,000.00 Dollars and This fund will be given to you through our office Western Union Payment Department, Akpakpa Dodome Cotonou Benin republic.
 Your winnings sum will be paid installment with sums of US$5000.00 dollars which will be sent to you in every Seven Hours (7hours) until the funds is completely paid to you, we program it in this way so that we can be able to conclude the transfer before going for Xmas /New Year vacation, once again this is as a result that $5000 is the maximum limit our Western Union payment Department can send per transaction, however, we are legally allowed to pay you this sum until you receive your winnings fund worth of US$100,000.00 United States dollars.
The Following is the Western Union Money Control Number for your First payment of $5000 dollars
Sender's first name: JOSEPH
Sender's Last Name: MOTIGWE
MTCN Number: 5165845264
Note; that the above has not been activated for you to pick up the funds because your Name has not yet been activated to pick up the funds until you fulfill the necessary obligation, otherwise to enable us to activate your payment immediately, you would be required to pay a small activation charge of US$50 dollars.
 Listen, be informed that this charge can not be deducted from your account because it's bonded and has been programmed till your final payment. This would be paid once and will not be requested to pay it after your transaction has been activated.
Moreover, you can send the activated fee of US$50 dollars to our Western Union payment agent with details below and as soon as it's done.
Upon the receipt of the US$50, dollars your programmed transaction will be activated in order to enable you to start receiving your winnings funds in US$5000 installments.
The Receivers Information For The US$50 dollars is as follows:
Receiver's Name:...................Obiechine Aloysius IZUOBA
Address:.....1108 central, Akpakpa Dodome Cotonou Benin republic
Text Question:................................ Urgent
Answer: ........................... Needed
Amount to be sent: US$50 Dollars
MTCN:..........................................???
Sender's Name:...........................Senders
Address:.......................
Immediately she receives the payment, our Western Union payment Department shall activate your programmed transaction to enable you to receive your first installment payment of $5000 immediately. Please Note: this control number (5165845264) should be kept very safe and secret for your own security, to avoid someone else tempering with your funds.
Kindly call for more Details and directives on our office phone line below +229-98-644-349.
We congratulate you in Advance, Merry Xmas and prosperous new year!
Regards,
Rose Agla
Winnings Claims Bonanza Department
Western Union Money Transfer Office

subject: Re:   Dear Customer,
body:
Hello Rose Agla,

Thank you for your email and the exciting news about the Western Union Money Transfer End of the Year Bonanza Draw. I must say, this is quite a surprise!

I'm curious to know more about this bonanza draw. How many people usually participate in it? And how was my name selected for this?

Also, could you please explain a bit more about the activation process? Why is there an activation charge and what does it cover exactly?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Louann
